input.sentences: the parade was fun for me | but not as much fun for my brother .
there lots of odd costumes and music .
we were in location location | so i wanted him to leave his comfort zone .
even though there were weird people dressed in odd costumes | he got a bit more comfortable being there .
he even took pictures of the event !
output.sentences: The mime and the crayon's were ready for the parade.
Then came the spades with their sign.
A group of dances from Vegas came.
The last in line came a army truck with a small stuffed dog stuck inside.
